name: Utils
body:
### Welcome to the Operations Utils project.
Here we house a commonly used scripts and tools for development

```
Current tools
PrettyPrint jQuery Plugin - jquery.prettyprint.js 
```
### PrettyPrint jQuery Plugin 
We've a created a plugin that allows you to pre-format any phone numbers on your webpage in a webdialer friendly format.

### How do I get started?
1. Include the library script source 
![Alt text](/documentation/script_include.png "class usage")
![Alt text](/documentation/html_markup.png "class usage")

### Support or Contact
Contact webops@glgroup.com
tagline: A commonly used framework of utilities
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
